summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue South, from Hinds Street to Andover Street, by constructing sewers, together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10380 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
